name: Goodnight Elizabeth
description:
Eliza wakes up in a forest, where she is quickly escorted to the nearby kingdom of Tatsel, without much of an explanation. However, when Tatsel's queens go missing, Eliza and her new friends are forced on a quest to find them.

Eliza is left to wonder one thing: why is she here?

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game took about a month and a half to develop. Please let me know what you thought. (The ending may not be quite clear, so feel free to ask me anything.)

Thank you so much for playing Goodnight Elizabeth!
